## Description {#details}

Base class for writing out Accelerator tables.

It holds the common functionality for the two Accelerator table types.

Definition at line 79 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/acceltable-cpp">AccelTable.cpp</a>.

### SkipIdenticalHashes {#a77c3dcce85f3af6ce04fdf3f71376b4a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AccelTable.cpp&#125;::AccelTableWriter::SkipIdenticalHashes</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Controls whether to emit duplicate hash and offset table entries for names with identical hashes.

Apple tables don&#39;t emit duplicate entries, DWARF v5 tables do.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/acceltable-cpp/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/acceltable-cpp">AccelTable.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
